column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3: 油断はするな…
column4: Don't get careless.

column3: 魔物のやつめ…
column4: Those monsters...

column3:
こんなことじゃ…
あたい ゲルド族失格だ…
column4:
I shame the Gerudo with a performance
like that.

column3: うう…魔物のやつめ…
column4: Urgh... That monster...

column3:
ガーディアンに用はない！
さっさと逃げるよ！
column4:
Oh, no. I'm not tangling with a Guardian!
Time to move!

column3:
あたいは ゲルド族のカーシャ！
覚えておきな！
はるか南西にあるゲルド砂漠から…
ヴォーイハントに オルディン地方に来たのさ
ここには なかなかのヴォーイが…
フフ…いるじゃないのさ
column4:
I'm Karsh of the Gerudo. Remember
that name! I came to Eldin from the
Gerudo Desert, far to the southwest.
I'm traveling in search of voe, but I
haven't found any good ones so far.
Until just now, heh heh.

column3:
はるか南西にあるゲルド砂漠から…
要するに ヴォーイハントに来たのさ
column4:
I came from Gerudo Desert, far to the
southwest, on a journey to hunt for voe.

column3:
あたいは ゲルド族のカーシャ！
覚えておきな！
この街道には いろんな種族の男がいるねえ
歩いているだけで ゾクゾクしてくるよ
ゴロン族のゴツゴツした肌も悪くないね！
column4:
I'm Karsh of the Gerudo. Remember
that name!I run into voe from all sorts of races
on the road. I like the Gorons a lot. I
wish my hide was as tough as theirs!

column3:
この街道には いろんな種族の男がいるねえ
歩いているだけで ゾクゾクしてくるよ
column4:
I run into voe from all sorts of races on
the road. It's so thrilling to see how the
rest of the world lives.

column3:
あたいは ゲルド族のカーシャ！
覚えておきな！
ゲルドの街には厳しい掟があって
ヴァーイしか入れない…
もし素敵なヴォーイと出会いたいなら？
こうして旅するしかないのさ！
column4:
I'm Karsh of the Gerudo. Remember
that name!Only vai are allowed in Gerudo Town.
Our laws are very strict about that.So the only way for us to meet strong
voe is to go on a journey outside the
town walls, like I'm doing now!

column3:
ゲルドの街にはヴァーイしか入れないからね
ヴォーイと出会うために旅をしてるのさ
column4:
Only vai are allowed in Gerudo Town, so
I'm on a journey outside the town walls
to meet a strong voe.

column3:
あたいは ゲルド族のカーシャ！
覚えておきな！
ここから北に行くとあるゴロンシティには
お肌にいいという ゴロン温泉がある
ただし たどり着くまでが お肌に悪い…
魔物に襲われて傷だらけってわけさ！
column4:
I'm Karsh of the Gerudo. Remember
that name!If you go north of here to Goron City,
there's a place called Goron Hot Springs 
that's supposed to be good for your skin.
And you'll need to take good care of
your skin, too, after the monsters on
the way tear it to ribbons!

column3:
北のゴロンシティにある ゴロン温泉は
お肌にいいらしいが その道中が危険すぎる…
column4:
Goron Hot Springs in Goron City to the
north is supposed to be good for your
skin, but it's a dangerous trip to make.

column3:
あたいは ゲルド族のカーシャ！
覚えておきな！
この山麓の馬宿からゴロンシティまでの道は
火山弾が飛んできて危険極まりない
もしもその危険に立ち向かう
勇敢なヴォーイがいるとしたら？
あたいはきっと惚れてしまうね！
column4:
I'm Karsh of the Gerudo. Remember
that name!The molten rocks raining down from the
volcano make the road from this stable
to Goron City a dangerous trek.
I'm thinking of challenging prospective
voe I meet to walk that road. It's one way
to weed out the cowards!

column3:
この山麓の馬宿からゴロンシティまでの道は
火山弾が飛んできて危険極まりないのさ
column4:
The molten rocks raining down from the
volcano make the road from this stable
to Goron City a dangerous trek.

column3: ヴォーイはいずこ？
column4: Where are the good voe?

column3: 今日もよく歩いた…
column4: Making good time...

column3: ヴォーイはいずこ？
column4: Where are the good voe?

column3: 今日もよく歩いた…
column4: Making good time...

column3: ちっ…
column4: I hate this sky water...

column3:
あたいの故郷は南西方面にあるゲルド砂漠さ
ヴォーイが見つかるまで帰るつもりはない
column4:
My home is in the Gerudo Desert to the
southwest of here. And I'm not going
back until I've found myself a voe.

column3:
この土地の暑さには正直まいるが
服が濡れても すぐに乾くのはありがたいな
column4:
The heat in this place is awful—even
worse than the desert's—but at least
it's a dry heat.

column3:
急な雨は好きじゃないが
出会いのきっかけとしては悪くない…
column4:
Water should never fall from the sky!
But I admit, it's a nice excuse to strike
up a conversation with people.

column3:
あたいは ゲルド族のカーシャ！
覚えておきな！
森の馬宿と山麓の馬宿を難なく行き来できる
頼もしいヴォーイは いないものかな
まだ見ぬその彼と二人で
いつか旅をしてみたいものだ…
column4:
I'm Karsh of the Gerudo. Remember
that name!I'd love to meet a voe brave-hearted
enough to walk the road between the
Woodland Stable and Foothill Stable.
I don't know if a voe like that exists,
but if he does, I'd be proud to walk at
his side. Just the two of us...

column3:
森の馬宿と山麓の馬宿を難なく行き来できる
頼もしいヴォーイは いないものかな
column4:
I'd love to meet a voe brave-hearted
enough to walk the road between the
Woodland Stable and Foothill Stable.

column3:
あたいは ゲルド族のカーシャ！
覚えておきな！
ゲルドの街を旅立って ずいぶん経つが
あたいの情熱は高まるばかりさ…
熱さに強いゴロン族ならば
あたいの恋の炎を受け止めてくれるかもな！
column4:
I'm Karsh of the Gerudo. Remember
that name!It's been quite a while since I left home
to go on this journey, but my passion
hasn't gone down one bit.
You know who else has endurance like
that? The Gorons. Maybe one of them
would be a match for me...

column3:
熱さに強いゴロン族ならば
あたいの恋の炎を受け止めてくれるかもな！
column4:
You know who has a lot of endurance?
The Gorons. Maybe one of them could
be a match for me...

column3:
あたいは ゲルド族のカーシャ！
覚えておきな！
種族を問わず運命のパートナーを見つけて
幸せに暮らすのが あたいの夢…
種族の違いなんて恋の前には無意味ね
カタツムリとデンデンムシほどの違いもない
column4:
I'm Karsh of the Gerudo. Remember
that name!All I want is to find the voe I was born
to be with. It doesn't matter to me which
race he is.
I wouldn't turn down a voe because his
skin was orange or his neck had gills.
This is true love we're talking about!

column3:
運命のパートナーを見つけて
幸せに暮らすのが あたいの夢よ
column4:
Once I've found the voe I was born to be
with, I can get on with the rest of my life.

column3:
あたいは ゲルド族のカーシャ！
覚えておきな！
こう見えても…
あたいは警備兵を務めたこともある弓の名手
魔物の頭を射抜く「ヘッドショット」で
ゲルドの街の住民を何度も救ってきたのさ！
column4:
I'm Karsh of the Gerudo. Remember
that name!I'm just a traveler now, but there was a
time when I was a master archer in the
Gerudo Town guard.
I can't count how many times I stopped
monsters from invading the town with
a single, well-placed arrow.

column3:
魔物の頭を射抜く「ヘッドショット」で
ゲルドの街の住民を何度も救ってきたのさ！
column4:
I can't count how many times I stopped
monsters from invading Gerudo Town
with a single, well-placed arrow.

column3:
あたいは ゲルド族のカーシャ！
覚えておきな！
ひとつ後悔してるのは
耐火効果のある服を持ってこなかったこと…
ここから北の火山道は ひどい熱さらしいんだ
砂漠の暑さと火山の熱さは別ものだからな！
column4:
I'm Karsh of the Gerudo. Remember
that name!The only thing I wish I'd brought on my
journey are some clothes that can
withstand the burning heat.
I hear it's unbearable on the roads
around the volcano. Even worse than
the desert air, if that's possible!

column3:
ここから北の火山道は ひどい熱さらしいのに
耐火効果のある服を忘れるなんてな…
column4:
I hear the heat on the roads around the
volcano is unbearable. I wish I'd thought
to bring some cooler clothes...

column3: 魔物はもう…去ったな？
column4: All clear?

column3: やっかいな魔物だよ まったく…
column4:
I'm so tired of dealing with these
monsters every day.

column3: 油断も隙も ありゃしないね…
column4: That's the way! Never give an inch!

column3: あたいにとっては何てことなかったが…
column4:
They have to come at me harder than
that to impress me.

column3:
はぁサヴォーテン…
あっ いや…なんでもない
column4:
Sa'oten... That was... *ahem* That was
nothing. I'm fine.

column3:
今度ばかりは ダメかと思った…
サークサーク…
column4:
I really thought the sands of my life had
run out... Sarqso!

column3: サヴォッタ！
column4: Sav'otta!

column3: サヴァーク！
column4: Sav'aaq.

column3: サヴァサーバ！
column4: Sav'saaba!

column3:
でも…まぁ…助かったよ
そうだな…礼ぐらいはしておかないとな
column4:
Hey... It would be rude of me not to
thank you for your help. So thanks.
